name: Golfo!
description:
Golfo is taking real time strategy games like Pikmin and mixing them with Golfing games! There are 5 types of Golfo at your disposal:

Destructo Golfo, these hard-hat wearing Golfos will destroy any walls in their area and carry the ball to the hole!

Sand Golfo, Cowboys that love the sand, the only Golfo that dare explore the sand!

Water Golfo, equipped with diving gear and iron boots, these Golfo can survive under water!

Soldier Golfo, sword and shield in hand, the soldiers will fight enemies and distract them while the other Golfo can work!

Jammo Golfo, at the end of each round you use the Jammo Golfo and hit it to where you want to tee off next round!

This ain't your average golf match! Only every shot to the Jammo Golfo counts towards you score! Hit as many other Golfo as you want, it doesn't matter!! Remember this is golf, the lower score the better! If you've ever played Mario Golf Toadstool Tour, the controls will feel similar, if not, good luck.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Control turning and preview shot distance

Scroll Wheel - Switch Golfo to Shoot

Left Mouse Click - Tee up, then again to Shoot

Right Mouse Click - Shot Preview Cam

M - Top Down Map View

G - Golfos on the Map View

B - Buy More Golfo

Created by :

https://twitter.com/MikMikEternity

https://twitter.com/ColossalCake

Derek#1942

THE STORY SO FAR...

JAMMO has landed on a strange and dangerous planet, but he has not crash landed here! He is here on vacation! To get away from the family for a bit, JAMMO is relaxing on planet Golfo. JAMMO's family sends a message saying they miss him, JAMMO replies "Just one more hole..." How will JAMMO get out this predicament!?
